name: Slash Chord Battlegrounds
description:
Happy April Fools! I made this game by recycling an old project I had for a parody of battle royales, but seeing as that would've been a very long-term project and by that point games like Fortnite or PUBG would've stopped being as popular, I decided to recycle it for this. Still, even though it's very simple and probably extremely buggy, I hope you'll like it!

Also I won't fix any bugs in this, sorry.

--------------- Original description ---------------

You guys may remember Slash Chord, the game I made for the MusicGameJam. Well, after entire hours of development, I'm finally ready to introduce a sequel to the game that changed the world.

Introducing the long-awaited sequel to Slash Chord...
